allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add PromptForge browser extension (Chrome/Edge)

Features:
- Quick popup interface with full enhancer
- Right-click context menu to enhance selected text
- Floating button on text selection
- Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+Shift+E, Ctrl+Shift+P)
- Background service worker for API calls
- Content script for webpage integration
- Auto-copy enhanced prompts to clipboard
- Enhancement history (last 50 items)
- Support for all Claude models and enhancement levels

Installation:
1. Go to chrome://extensions/
2. Enable Developer Mode
3. Load unpacked extension folder
4. Start enhancing prompts!

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
